description: Toggl Track is a time tracking application that allows users to track their daily activities across different platforms.

actions.name: create_client
actions.description: Create a new client in a workspace.

actions.name: create_project
actions.description: Create a new project in a workspace.

actions.name: create_tag
actions.description: Create a new tag in the workspace.

actions.name: create_task
actions.description: Create a new task under a project.

actions.name: create_time_entry
actions.description: Create a new time entry in a workspace.

actions.name: find_client
actions.description: Find a client by name or status in a workspace.

actions.name: find_project
actions.description: Find a project in a workspace by its name.

actions.name: find_tag
actions.description: Find a tag by name in a workspace.

actions.name: find_task
actions.description: Find a task by name and status.

actions.name: find_user
actions.description: Find a user in a workspace by their name or email.

actions.name: start_time_entry
actions.description: Start a new time entry (live timer).

actions.name: stop_time_entry
actions.description: Stops the currently running time entry.

triggers.name: new_client
triggers.description: Fires when a new client is created in a workspace.

triggers.name: new_project
triggers.description: Fires when a new project is added.

triggers.name: new_tag
triggers.description: Triggers when a new tag is created

triggers.name: new_task
triggers.description: Fires when a new task is created.

triggers.name: new_time_entry_started
triggers.description: Fires when a new time entry is started and is currently running.

triggers.name: new_time_entry
triggers.description: Fires when a new time entry is added (with optional project/task filter).

triggers.name: new_workspace
triggers.description: Fires when a workspace is created or updated (Toggl only supports workspace updated events).
